verification_reason: Generiert aus KMK-Bildungsstandards und Vergleichscurricula, da offizielle Niedersachsen-Quelle (cuvo.nibis.de) nicht vollständig erreichbar war

fallback_sources_attempted.error: Limited search functionality, no direct curriculum download available

official_source.last_error: Multiple official Niedersachsen sources unavailable or incomplete

fallback_sources.synthesis_method: Combined KMK standards with comparable state curricula (Bayern, BW, NRW)

quality_assurance.completeness_assessment: Good foundation, should be verified against official KC Niedersachsen when available

recommended_action: Retry official Niedersachsen source (cuvo.nibis.de) when available and compare with this synthesized version. Update curriculum if significant differences found.
notes: This curriculum provides a solid foundation for test generation based on KMK standards and comparable state curricula. It covers the core topics expected for Gymnasium Grade 6 Biology in Germany. However, regional specificities of Niedersachsen may not be fully represented.
